official_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Investigating Use of Submucosal Injection of EverLift in Rates of Complete Resection of Nonpedunculated Polyps 4-9mm
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients 18 years or older
* Polyps 4-9mm
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnant
* Inflammatory bowel disease
* Polyposis syndromes
